This dataset contains a list of video games dating from 1995 to 2021, it also provides things such as release dates, user review rating, and critic review rating.
The dataset is downloaded from [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/deepcontractor/top-video-games-19952021-metacritic). Original Website where the data is scraped from is [Metacritic](https://www.metacritic.com/browse/games/score/metascore/all/all/filtered?page=0).
